landing.title: Launch Your Modern Web App Fast
landing.subtitle: Full-featured launchpad powered by Next.js, React 19, PostgreSQL, and Auth.js

auth.title: Secure Authentication
auth.description: Ready-to-use authentication system with Auth.js v5

db.title: Modern Database
db.description: Type-safe queries with PostgreSQL 18 and Drizzle ORM

ui.title: Beautiful UI
ui.description: Modern design with shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS

auth.resetPasswordDescription: Enter your email to reset your password
auth.setNewPasswordDescription: Please enter your new password below.

verifyEmail.successMessage: Your email has been successfully verified. You can now log in.

errors.emailExists: This email is already in use

account.title: Account Settings
account.subtitle: Manage your account security and preferences

password.title: Change Password
password.description: Update your password to keep your account secure
password.hint: Password must be at least 8 characters

twoFactor.title: Two-Factor Authentication
twoFactor.subtitle: Add an extra layer of security to your account
twoFactor.totpDescription: Secure your account using Google Authenticator or similar app
twoFactor.setupDescription: Enable two-factor authentication to add an extra layer of security to your account
twoFactor.scanQR: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app
twoFactor.enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
twoFactor.backupCodesDescription: Save these codes in a safe place. You can use them to log in if you don't have access to your phone.
twoFactor.disableWarning: Disabling two-factor authentication will make your account less secure.

danger.title: Danger Zone
danger.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data from our servers.
danger.confirmHint: Please type DELETE in capital letters to confirm
danger.confirmError: Please type DELETE to confirm deletion

admin.title: Admin Dashboard
admin.subtitle: Manage users, subscriptions, and platform statistics

delete.title: Delete User
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.

billing.title: Billing & Subscription
billing.subtitle: Manage your payment methods and subscription

cancel.title: Cancel Subscription
cancel.description: Your subscription will remain active until the end of the current billing period

invoices.title: Invoice History
invoices.description: View and download your past invoices

pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
pricing.subtitle: Select the perfect plan for your needs

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Perfect for professionals and small teams

404.title: Page Not Found
404.description: The page you're looking for doesn't exist

dataExportPage.title: Data Export
dataExportPage.subtitle: Download your personal data in accordance with GDPR

dataExport.title: Export Your Data
dataExport.description: Download a copy of all your personal data stored in our system. This includes your profile information, preferences, and connected accounts.

formats.json: Structured data format, ideal for developers and data processing
formats.csv: Spreadsheet format, easy to view in Excel or Google Sheets

includes.title: Your export will include:
includes.excluded: Note: Passwords and security tokens are excluded for your protection.

toast.exportError: Failed to export data. Please try again.

activityLog.title: Activity Log
activityLog.subtitle: View your account activity and login history
activityLog.recentActivityDescription: A log of all important actions performed on your account

footer.brandDescription: Launch your modern web app fast with our full-featured Next.js launchpad

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Building the future of web development, one stack at a time

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: We started with a simple mission: make it easier for developers to build production-ready web applications without spending weeks on setup and configuration.
story.paragraph2: After building countless web apps and repeating the same setup process over and over, we decided to create the ultimate launchpad - a Next.js base stack that includes everything you need to get started.
story.paragraph3: Today, thousands of developers use our stack to launch their ideas faster, focusing on what matters most: building great products.

speed.title: Speed First
speed.description: We optimize for developer velocity. Get your ideas to production faster with our pre-configured stack.

security.title: Security Built-in
security.description: Security isn't an afterthought. We implement best practices from day one.

quality.title: Code Quality
quality.description: Clean, maintainable code with TypeScript, proper testing, and modern development practices.

open.title: Open & Transparent
open.description: Open source, clear documentation, and a community-driven approach to development.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers building amazing products

hero.title: Get in Touch
hero.subtitle: Have questions? We'd love to hear from you. Send us a message and we'll respond as soon as possible.

form.title: Send us a Message
form.description: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you within 24 hours

message.label: Message
message.placeholder: Tell us more about your inquiry...

toast.success: Message sent successfully! We'll get back to you soon.
toast.error: Failed to send message. Please try again.

info.title: Contact Information
info.description: Reach out to us through any of these channels

cookies.title: Cookie Policy
cookies.description: Learn about the cookies used on this website

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit websites. They are widely used to make websites work more efficiently, remember your preferences, and provide information to website owners.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.description: We use cookies on our website for various purposes including session management, remembering user preferences, analyzing how our site is used, and improving our services.

necessary.title: Necessary Cookies
necessary.description: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They include session management, authentication, and security features. Without these cookies, the site cannot function properly.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality and personalization. They help us remember your language preference, theme settings, and other personalization options.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website. We collect anonymous information about page visits, traffic sources, and how visitors navigate through the site.

marketing.title: Marketing Cookies
marketing.description: These cookies are used to show you relevant advertisements. They track visitors across websites and build profiles based on your interests to display targeted ads.

manageCookies.title: Managing Cookies
manageCookies.description: You can manage your cookie preferences from your profile settings or control cookies through your browser settings. Note that disabling some cookies may affect the functionality of the website.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: If you have any questions about our cookie policy, please contact us.

banner.title: Cookie Preferences
banner.description: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience and analyze our traffic. Please choose which cookies you consent to.
banner.necessaryDescription: Required for the website to function properly. These cookies cannot be disabled.
banner.functionalDescription: Enable enhanced functionality and personalization, such as language preferences and theme settings.
banner.analyticsDescription: Help us understand how visitors interact with our website by collecting anonymous information.
banner.marketingDescription: Used to track visitors across websites to display relevant advertisements.

comingSoon.title: Coming Soon
comingSoon.description: We're working on our blog section
comingSoon.message: We'll be sharing great content here soon. Stay tuned for updates!
